translations: v.原谅；为……辩解；免除……的责任（excuse 的第三人称单数）
n.借口，理由；拙劣样品；假条（excuse 的复数）

phrs.translation: v. 为自己辩解；请求免除；请求准予离开
(对不能出席社交聚会等)表示抱歉(或遗憾)

sentences.sentence: He always gives the same old excuses.
sentences.translation: 他总是找那些老掉牙的借口。

sentences.sentence: Don't let him fob you off with any more excuses.
sentences.translation: 别让他再以任何借口哄骗你了。

sentences.sentence: She is not short of excuses when things go wrong.
sentences.translation: 事情出了差错，她老有借口。
